name: .FPID File Extension
summary: Learn about .FPID files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: FPID files are not meant to be opened. Instead, the AI Wizard included with FPS Creator references the data stored in the FPID file when you configure enemy or ally behavior and then generates a corresponding FPI script that the game engine can execute.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
